row.entry: Markup tags within a currently active translation can be overwritten.
Markup tags are not shown (they are there, but invisible).
Markup tags are replaced by a special character indicating the position of the tag.

body.p:
The status bar at the bottom of the editor window displays the following information (from left to right):
<dlentryM flag Shows whether or not the contains any m flags (On or Off). Document <ddDisplays the name of the document where the active translation segment originates from and the line number of the segment. Date Displays the date at which the translation was added to the Translation Memory. Segment n of m Displays the number of the currently active segment (n) and the total number of segments loaded into the editor (m). <dtLoaded Displays how much of the Translation Memory has been loaded into the editor.
